summary: A heavily armed cult in rural Texas is stormed by FBI and local police at dawn. Hell breaks loose. Some cops make it to an abandoned farmhouse, where they find two cute cult women.
cast: Robert Sean Leonard|Dennis Haysbert|Natasha Henstridge|Keith Carradine|Paul Scherrer|Tricia Vessey|Paul Ben-Victor|Andre G. Ellingson|David Hart|Michael O'Neill|Janet Elaine
title: Pradera de fuego
